Consumables | Elden Ring Wiki

Consumables

Consumable Tools,

is a category of items often utilized for their immediate or temporary effects during exploration or

. While they can be found while exploring the Lands Between, many

have adequate supplies, or they can be

by the player. This page covers their names, type, effect, and acquisition.

, craftable consumables are automatically replenished without cost upon the completion of a colosseum battle. Items that are not craftable do not replenish upon the completion of a colosseum battle.

Elden Ring Consumables

Sacred Flasks

Sites of Grace

, you can assign uses of, and upgrade, your flasks.

Sacred Flasks are upgraded using

Golden Seeds

Sacred Tears

Golden Seeds

, picked from ethereal saplings, increase the flask's total number of uses up to 14.

Sacred Tears

Sacred Flasks are upgraded using

Golden Seeds

Sacred Tears

Golden Seeds

, picked from ethereal saplings, increase the flask's total number of uses up to 14.

Sacred Tears

, found inside many of the land's decayed churches, increase the potency of the flask's restoration up to +12.

Flask of Wondrous Physick

Sites of Grace

you can mix two

Crystal Tears

inside the flask for various special effects.

Crystal Tears

can be naturally found through exploration, but many are located at the base of Minor Erdtrees.
